content: Sporting event delegation **[Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)** participated in the **[1951 Asian Games](/wiki/1951_Asian_Games)**, which was held in the capital city of [New Delhi](/wiki/New_Delhi), [India](/wiki/India) from 4 March 1951 to 11 March 1951. Singapore sent 20 athletes to the Games and ranked 4th in the first edition edition of the [Asiad](/wiki/Asian_Games). ## Competitors Singapore sent 20 athletes. ## Medalists The following Singapore competitors won medals at the Games.
